issue.title: [JS] Working Dockerfile for docker-compose setup
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3365](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3365). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Dockerfile https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2572/files#diff-a6b24713199de032fd4141b04a163594 fails to build

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3365?focusedCommentId=17476936) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
Since this issue has been open since 2018 and there was no activity, I am going to close it. Please reopen and add some updated details if it's still an issue.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3365?focusedCommentId=17586015) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
